page.title: 15EGGINTON HORTICULTURAL SHOW
page.content: The Horticultural Show in Egginton is run by the members of the Egginton Horticultural Society for members, villagers and anyone who wishes to enter. The show is always held at the beginning of September in the Memorial Hall, which is also the main school building. For the past few years the children have had their own special classes, which have included such things as paintings, baking and growing sunflowers. Other classes are grouped into either open, for everyone, or closed, for society members only. They include sections for fruit, vegetables, flowers and a domestic section for jams, wine, preserves and baking. Mrs. P. Ware
